definition: to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: There are many alternatives in obtaining tandem axle dump truck financing.
sentences.chinese: 有许多替代品在获得串联轴自卸车融资。

sentences.english: I also like the wooden and ceramic variations as well.
sentences.chinese: 我同样喜欢木制的和陶瓷替代品。

sentences.english: Paint.NET: the other "big name" alternative. Paint.
As substitutes of antibiotics, probiotics were attracted extensive attention.
sentences.chinese: 益生素作为抗生素的替代品，引起了人们的极大关注。

sentences.english: In the 21st century, there's no realistic alternative to siding with people power.
sentences.chinese: 21世纪，没有支持人民权利的实际替代品。

sentences.english: But efficiency is no substitute for pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 但效率是不快乐的替代品。

sentences.english: The Medivac Dropship was the controversial replacement to the Medic.
sentences.chinese: 医疗运输机是极具争议的护士的替代品。

sentences.english: Costume body model is taken as the alternative of body in solid cutting out.
sentences.chinese: 服装人体模型在立体裁剪中充当人体的替代品。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo compare the difference of quality between Dendrobium candidum and Dendrobium devonianum.
sentences.chinese: 目的对比铁皮石斛与其常用替代品在品质方面的差异。

sentences.english: This system is a friction-free alternative to trailing cables, such as with high-bay stackers.
sentences.chinese: 该系统无摩擦，是替随行电缆的良好替代品。
这一临时性的替代品已经成了化石。

sentences.english: Long out of print, the Collection has finally been supplanted.
sentences.chinese: 这张绝版已久的合集如今终于有了替代品。

sentences.english: These days there are many alternatives to diets without carbs that are tasty and nutritious.
sentences.chinese: 现在，有很多碳水化合物的替代品，好吃又不失营养。

sentences.english: The perfect alternative to baby soaps that contain harsh lathering agents and paraben preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 是含有起泡剂和防腐剂儿童香波的完美替代品。

sentences.english: A safe and effective alternative to chemical and laser peels.
sentences.chinese: 安全高效，是化学和激光去斑的替代品。

sentences.english: Have your nicotine-replacement products or other aids ready.
sentences.chinese: 准备好尼古丁替代品或其他方法。

definition: to replace/to take the place of
to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
